SPI Driver Error Codes

The section has a list of all the error codes which are generated by the CRC Driver module. More...

#define SPI_EINVAL   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SPI_BASE - 2)
 An error code returned by SPI APIs for invalid input values.
 
#define SPI_ENOTIMPL   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SPI_BASE - 3)
 An error code returned by SPI APIs for features not implemented.
 
#define SPI_EDMACONF   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SPI_BASE - 4)
 An error code returned by SPI APIs for features not implemented.
 

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the error codes which are generated by the CRC Driver module.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define SPI_EINVALCMD   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_SPI_BASE - 1)

An error status code returned by SPI_control() for undefined command codes.

SPI_control() returns SPI_EINVALCMD if the control code is not recognized by the driver implementation.

#define SPI_STATUS_SUCCESS   0

Successful status code returned by SPI_control().

SPI_control() returns SPI_STATUS_SUCCESS if the control code was executed successfully.
